There are 4 types of gaps.
“Common Gap” that occurs during a sideways trend or a crowded trading phase / “Breakaway Gap” that occurs during a crowded phase or adjustment phase / “Run-away Gap” that occurs when the price rises (suddenly falls) in the middle after a breakout occurs https://t.co/5NZ6p773BU
